description.value: Information about juristictional sone/subsone of the Person. Could be nested. The information about each sone must be included in a Bundle.

short.value: Reference to the top level in the Sone hierarcy

definition.value: Information about juristictional sone/subsone of the Person. Could be nested. The information about each sone must be included in a Bundle where the vkp-Patient is present as well as a vkp-sone-Location resource for each sone.

short.value: Reference to the top level in the Sone hierarcy

definition.value: Reference to the top level Sone in the Sone hierarcy. Provides information about juristictional sone/subsone of the Person. The Sone system can be nested. The information about each sone in the hierarcy must be included in a Bundle to provide information about each sone/Subsone/district e.a.
